structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Publication of annual financial statement of counties containing city of first class.
law.text: The fiscal court of each county that contains a city of the first class shall cause to be published pursuant to KRS Chapter 424, at the end of each fiscal year, a financial statement of the county which shall include a list of the claims and amounts thereof allowed against the county during the preceding fiscal year, and to whom allowed, with such other information as the fiscal court deems proper to have published.
law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 18. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1851b-4.
